name: Brutally Shifty Dance Crew
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 35

They'd all come to watch you dance. Now let's make it count and give them a real show.

Click the shapes yelled out by the crowd to refill your energy bar and keep dancing as long as possible.

If your energy bar empties then it's all over for another year.

Controls:

Click the shape called out to refill your energy on mobile or . 

Keyboard numbers 1 (Circle), 2 (Rectangle), 3 (Triangle) & 4 (Square).
